entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Smith Airport 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 20.
